title: What e-mail implies about Wang Yuehua

content.question: What does the e-mail imply about Wang Yuehua?

choices.label: She is a new member of the Chinese club.
She is not aware of the upcoming event.
She is going to be away next week.

content.answer: She is not aware of the upcoming event.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
